name: Dream Jump (Casey Jarmes)
description:
A 3D platformer about traveling through stress nightmares in search of good sleep.

Level Design by Ian Jeannin and Casey Jarmes

Programming by Charles Barksdale and Nathaniel Vladic

Enviormental Art by Exekiel Pearson

Character Art by Kevin Resnick

Rigging by Ean Losselyoung

Sound by Gareth Davies and Ben Linnertz

Music by Macy Camille. Lydia Tingxi, and Marissa Hickman
